attributes.title: i would give it 0 stars if I could
attributes.review: this app made no sense at all. everything written was contradicting the next sentence. it was offensive and incoherent. but it was creative because I thought only someone racist, homophobic, antisemitic and with dementia could construct an app like this. im surprised to see the president come out of his comfort zone! crazy coincidence!

attributes.title: APP CAUSED STROKE! WILL BE SUEING
attributes.review: I opened the app to see an instituted picture of a orange man with a wig on. I immediately collapsed onto the floor and started profusely barfing all over. After I threw up I went to pick up my phone to call 911 and once again saw a burnt orange man with a toupe on. Seeing the image again led to a stroke and now I am in a vegetative state. Would not recommend downloading .

attributes.title: terrifying👁👄👁
attributes.review:
when i first downloaded this app and got on there was a big Cheeto man NAKED- I’m scarred.
my phone then completely shut down and started to levitate over to the garbage disposal🤚 my garbage disposal then turned on and my phone was dead 😾 rip. Anyways DONT download unless you want your phone to get possessed and get smashed into a billion pieces😀

attributes.title: VIRUS
attributes.review: Downloading this app gave my phone Covid because Trump’s lack of executive assistance in preventing the spread is starting to affect our technology. Also, I think the orange man they keep showing me in the app is going to haunt me in my sleep...       👁👄👁 this app provides no assistance in telling me whether or not his toupee is alive or not. Wish I could give it 0 stars super unhelpful.

attributes.title: DiSgUsTaNg!!!!
attributes.review: I’d like to point out bruised orange in the front, very distasteful. I can’t play the app because there’s too many racist white karens and hillbilly joes that think saying the “n” word is cool on this app and I don’t think I’d want that to carry on to the next generation. Anyway...I just don’t want a racist, misogynistic, watered down Cheeto pedo as a president.😌✋ and I live by that. Xoxo❤️

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app is terrible. I couldn’t even sign up due to my excessive vomiting when I opened the app. The first thing I saw was a moldy Cheeto standing in front of the American flag. It also sends a terrible amount of spam notifications to my phone BEGGING for money. I hate this app and took it off my phone IMMEDIATELY. I’m not a Karen. Just trying to save Gen Z!

attributes.title: Worst cooking app I’ve ever used !!
attributes.review: This app had no recipes! It didn’t teach me how to cook anything at all!! All it talked about was “rigging an election” and trying to promote “systemic racism.” I can’t believe Apple allowed this app to be put on the App Store! I’m gonna take my business to TikTok instead. At least I find recipes on TikTok! Get slurped, snowflakes! Go cry about it 👁👄👁

attributes.title: VERY NASTY!
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw a nasty picture of a Cheeto getting a spray tan! Not to mention seeing his little 🍤 penis oh my gosh I am mortified! My sister also saw this picture and she went into shock because it was so horrific! I had to take her to the ER were they told me should would have ShripDickites from seeing that horrible picture BE AWARE OF THIS!!

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: when i opened the app, all i saw was big cheeto mans selfies and weird pics of him, i enjoyed laughing for a while but then i decided to get off the app and onto tiktok. when i did, all my apps were deleted except this one and my wallpaper and contact pics were pics of cheeto man. awful experience. DO NOT GET THE APP 😭

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: the minute i opened the app i saw a horrifying picture of some type of orange chip which scared me🤮. Then it asked if i was a hispanic and if i was they were going to kick me out. I ignored it then it asked if i was under the age of 18 to click on a link so i could have a “special meeting” with the president🙀🤖. don’t recommend
